text: Alien Nation is a 1988 American science fiction action movie directed by Graham Baker and starring James Caan, Mandy Patinkin, Terence Stamp, Kevyn Major Howard, Leslie Bevis, Peter Jason, Roger Aaron Brown, Jeff Kober. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and spwaned TV series and 5 television movies from 1994 to 1997. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1988 science fiction movies Category:1988 action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies set in the 1990s
title: Alien Nation (movie)
